content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the movie night throw size 13 sizes available from lovey all the way up to king size skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn bernat blanket i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #movienightthrow refund there are no refunds on patterns resell finished product with pattern credit © 2022 cj design all rights reserved
